mapper.insert: insert into COM_PROPERTIES (PK_ID, FK_ID, NAME, VALUE, DESCRIBE) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select PK_ID, FK_ID, NAME, VALUE, DESCRIBE from COM_PROPERTIES
